title: NBA Bubble Trouble
description: It's a beautiful day to get in the KAJ, as Katie, Ashley and Jay get into all of the major sports updates: The NBA Bubble (31:27), MLB Mayhem (54:22), Mike Gundy (1:05:51), NWSL Challenge Cup (1:15:46), What is the NFL Doing? (1:18:27), and the Premier League is BACK (1:23:50). There's a Challenge Update (1:27:19),there's French News (1:41:31), and a whole lot more.
